signup-title: No account yet? Sign up below:
verify-account-message: Please verify your email address before continuing.
unapproved-entity-message: Your account has not yet been approved by an admin.
verify-success-alert-entity: Verification successful. Your account is pending approval by our admins.
authentication-required-message: You do not have access to this page. Please login or signup for an account.
recover-password-message: Enter your email to receive instructions for resetting your password.
reset-password-sent-message: An email with password recovery instructions has been sent.
password-changed: Your password has been changed successfully.

verify-email.subject: Common Democracy: Please Verify Your Email
verify-email.body:
To verify your email address __emailAddress__ visit the following link:

 __url__ 

 If you did not request this verification, please ignore this email. If you feel something is wrong, please contact our support team: __supportEmail__.

reset-password.subject: Common Democracy: Reset Your Password
reset-password.body:
To reset your password, simply click the link below: 

 __url__ 

 If you did not request to change your password, please ignore this email. If you feel something is wrong, please contact our support team: __supportEmail__.
